meta.content: Front Page; New York and Region
meta.name: online_sections

block.p: No Rehearing in Boy's Case A federal appeals court refused to reconsider the case of Elian Gonzalez. Unless the Supreme Court intervenes, the boy is free to return to Cuba on Wednesday. PAGE A6
No Rehearing in Boy's Case A federal appeals court refused to reconsider the case of Elian Gonzalez. Unless the Supreme Court intervenes, the boy is free to return to Cuba on Wednesday. PAGE A6

Drug Claim in Subway Crash The motorman on the subway train that derailed Tuesday night tested positive for cocaine, transit officials said, but they doubted that his actions caused the accident. PAGE B1
Amazon Shares Plunge 19% Concern about the financial health of the Internet retailer Amazon.com, which has never had a profit, sent its shares plummeting 19 percent, to $33.875 a share. PAGE C1
Court Upholds Smog Curbs A federal appeals court has upheld a government program meant to drastically reduce smog that flows from the Middle West to the East. The ruling affects 19 states. PAGE A6
